document.full_text: world premieres of plays by amy herzog and will eno, as well as productions of chekhov's "three sisters," moliere's "a doctor in spite of himself" and shakespeare's "winter's tale" are to be featured in the 2011-12 season.
document.title: yale repertory theater announces new plays
lines_and_colors: world premieres of plays by amy herzog and will eno, as well as productions of chekhov's "three sisters," moliere's "a doctor in spite of himself" and shakespeare's "winter's tale" are to be featured in the 2011-12 season.
